options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: FILENAME
options.description: The local pcap file to process

options.name: FILE_FILTER
options.description: The filter string to apply on the file

options.name: LOOP
options.description: The number of times to loop through the file

options.name: DELAY
options.description: the delay in millisecond between each loop

options.name: PKT_DELAY
options.description: the delay in millisecond between each packet
